location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that Assistant Surgeon James Pringle Riach had returned to the Bushire Residency following his employment with the Envoy to the Court of Persia, and had resumed his duties from Assistant Surgeon Henry Johnston, who was proceeding to the Residency at Bussorah [Basra].The letter goes on to enclose a statement of the allowances drawn by Assistant Surgeon Riach both during his absence and following his return to Bushire.
